name: Performerâ€™s Companion Vol. (Legendary)
entries: This tome contains the secrets to performance and writing.

It can be read over 1 week to grant a creature a {@dice 1d12} to one roll during their downtime. Alternatively, a creature reading it can instead read the book to increase their Journalism, Performance, or Theft labor tier by 4.
Once this book has been used in this way 4 times it becomes no longer magical. Reading the book can be done during leisure time and does not require the use of downtime.
